data.title: Paul Randolph Bratton
data.meta_description: Born in  25 Mar 1892 and died in 16 Dec 1986. Buried in Mt Carmel, Wabash County IL, Highland Memorial Cemetery.  Paul Randolph Bratton.
data.text:
Paul Randolph Bratton Born: 25 Mar 1892 Died: 16 Dec 1986 Plot:

Where born: Wabash Co

Where died: Carterville IL

Son of: Robert Henry Bratton (s/of Amos) & Fannie Maria Stewart (d/of Wesley C Stewart)

Married 1st: Ursa A Arnold

Married 2nd: 27 Nov 1960 Olney Agnes Marie Storer

Children:

- Mary Frances (ca 1915/6 m: ? Hobbs)

- Paul Arnold (21 May 1917 Wabash-2 May 2010 KY m: Ruth Helene)

- Henry P* (1919-2003)

- Lewis Milton (ca 1922 IL)

- Harold Kenneth (ca 1924 IL res: Posey IN)

- Chester L (ca 1927 IL)

- Phyllis (ca 1931 IL m: ? Webb res: Colorado Springs CO) stepdau: Valeta F Coon (Carterville IL); stepsons: Harold Eugene Storer (woodriver)

- Carl Leon Storer (Troy)
